price: (43) Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.[1733]
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
